00020 
00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 
00025 using Niry;
00026 using Niry.Utils;
00027 using Niry.Network;
00028 
00029 using NyFolder;
00030 using NyFolder.GUI;
00031 using NyFolder.Utils;
00032 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00033 
00034 namespace NyFolder.GUI.Glue {
00035     public enum AcceptUserType {Yes, No, Ask};
00036     public delegate AcceptUserType AcceptUserHandler (PeerSocket peer, UserInfo info);
00037 
00038     public sealed class NetworkManager {
00039         // ============================================
00040         // PUBLIC STATIC Events
00041         // ============================================
00042         public static event AcceptUserHandler UserAccept = null;
00043 
00044         // ============================================
00045         // PRIVATE Members
00046         // ============================================
00047         private NotebookViewer notebookViewer;
00048         private NetworkViewer networkViewer;
00049         private MenuManager menuManager;
00050         private UserPanel userPanel;
00051 
00052         private P2PManager p2pManager;
00053 
00054         // ============================================
00055         // PUBLIC Constructors
00056         // ============================================
00057         public NetworkManager (GUI.Window window) {
00058             // Initialize Events (None)
00059             UserAccept = null;
00060 
00061             // Initialize Components
00062             this.menuManager = window.Menu;
00063             this.userPanel = window.UserPanel;
00064             this.notebookViewer = window.NotebookViewer;
00065             this.networkViewer = this.notebookViewer.NetworkViewer;
00066 
00067             // Initialize P2PManager & CMD Manager
00068             this.p2pManager = P2PManager.GetInstance();
00069 
00070             // Network
00071             SetSensitiveNetworkMenu(P2PManager.IsListening());
00072 
00073             // Add Event Handlers
00074             menuManager.Activated += new EventHandler(OnMenuActivated);
00075             networkViewer.ItemRemoved += new PeerSelectedHandler(OnPeerRemove);
00076             CmdManager.AddProtocolEvent += new SetProtocolEventHandler(OnAddProtocolEvent);
00077             CmdManager.DelProtocolEvent += new SetProtocolEventHandler(OnDelProtocolEvent);
00078         }
00079 
00080         ~NetworkManager() {
00081             CmdManager.AddProtocolEvent -= new SetProtocolEventHandler(OnAddProtocolEvent);
00082             CmdManager.DelProtocolEvent -= new SetProtocolEventHandler(OnDelProtocolEvent);
00083         }
00084 
00085         // ============================================
00086         // PUBLIC Methods
00087         // ============================================
00088 
00089         // ============================================
00090         // PRIVATE (Methods) Menu Event Handlers
00091         // ============================================
00092         private void OnMenuActivated (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00093             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00094                 Action action = sender as Action;
00095                 switch (action.Name) {
00096                     // Network
00097                     case "NetOnline":
00098                         OnNetOnline((ToggleAction) action);
00099                         break;
00100                     case "SetPort":
00101                         Dialogs.SetP2PPort();
00102                         break;
00103                     case "AddPeer":
00104                         UserInfo userInfo = Glue.Dialogs.AddPeer();
00105                         if (userInfo != null) UserConnect(userInfo);
00106                         break;
00107                     case "RmPeer":
00108                         userInfo = Glue.Dialogs.RemovePeer(networkViewer);
00109                         if (userInfo != null) RemoveUser(userInfo);
00110                         break;
00111                 }
00112             });
00113         }
00114 
00115         // ============================================
00116         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00117         // ============================================
00118         private void OnNetOnline (ToggleAction action) {
00119             // Set UserPanel Online/Offline Status
00120             SetSensitiveNetworkMenu(action.Active);
00121             userPanel.SetOnlineStatusIcon(action.Active);
00122 
00123             if (action.Active == true) {
00124                 try {
00125                     P2PStartListening();
00126                     ConnectToWebServer();
00127                 } catch {
00128                     action.Active = false;
00129                 }               
00130             } else {
00131                 try {
00132                     DisconnectFromWebServer();
00133                     this.RemoveAllUsers();
00134                     this.p2pManager.StopListening();
00135                 } catch (Exception e) {
00136                     Base.Dialogs.MessageError("P2P Disconnection Error", e.Message);
00137                 }
00138             }
00139         }
00140 
00141         private void OnPeerLogin (PeerSocket peer, UserInfo userInfo) {
00142             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00143                 AcceptUserType acceptUser = AcceptUserType.Ask;
00144 
00145                 // Raise Accept User Event
00146                 if (UserAccept != null)
00147                     acceptUser = UserAccept(peer, userInfo);
00148 
00149                 // Ask if Accept User
00150                 if (acceptUser == AcceptUserType.Ask)
00151                     acceptUser = AcceptUser(peer) ? AcceptUserType.Yes : AcceptUserType.No;
00152 
00153                 // Accept Peer (Add to NetworkViewer) or Remove Peer (P2PManager)
00154                 if (acceptUser == AcceptUserType.Yes) {
00155                     AddUser(userInfo);
00156                 } else {
00157                     P2PManager.RemovePeer(peer);
00158                 }
00159             });
00160         }
00161 
00162         private void OnPeerDisconnect (object sender, PeerEventArgs args) {
00163             PeerSocket peer = sender as PeerSocket;
00164             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00165                 if (peer.Info != null) RemoveUser((UserInfo) peer.Info);
00166             });
00167         }
00168 
00169         private void OnPeerError (object sender, PeerEventArgs args) {
00170             PeerSocket peer = sender as PeerSocket;
00171             UserInfo userInfo = peer.Info as UserInfo;
00172             Debug.Log("Peer ({0}) Error: {1}", userInfo.Name, args.Message);
00173         }
00174 
00175         public void OnPeerRemove (object sender, UserInfo userInfo) {
00176             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate { RemoveUser(userInfo); });
00177         }
00178 
00179         // =============================================
00180         // PRIVATE Methods (My Connection/Disconnection)
00181         // =============================================
00182         private void OnAddProtocolEvent (P2PManager p2pManager) {
00183             P2PManager.PeerError += new PeerEventHandler(OnPeerError);
00184             CmdManager.LoginEvent += new ProtocolLoginHandler(OnPeerLogin);
00185             P2PManager.PeerDisconnecting += new PeerEventHandler(OnPeerDisconnect);
00186         }
00187 
00188         private void OnDelProtocolEvent (P2PManager p2pManager) {
00189             P2PManager.PeerError -= new PeerEventHandler(OnPeerError);
00190             CmdManager.LoginEvent -= new ProtocolLoginHandler(OnPeerLogin);
00191             P2PManager.PeerDisconnecting -= new PeerEventHandler(OnPeerDisconnect);
00192         }
00193 
00194         private void P2PStartListening() {
00195             try {
00196                 // P2P Start Listening
00197                 this.p2pManager.StartListening();
00198             } catch (Exception e) {
00199                 Base.Dialogs.MessageError("P2P Starting Error", e.Message);
00200                 // ReTrow Exception
00201                 throw(e);
00202             }
00203         }
00204 
00205         private void ConnectToWebServer() {         
00206             try {
00207                 // Connect To NyFolder Web Server
00208                 MyInfo.ConnectToWebServer(this.p2pManager.CurrentPort);
00209             } catch (Exception e) {
00210                 Base.Dialogs.MessageError("Connect To Web Server", e.Message);
00211 
00212                 // P2P Stop Listening
00213                 this.p2pManager.StopListening();
00214 
00215                 // ReTrow Exception
00216                 throw(e);
00217             }
00218         }
00219 
00220         private void DisconnectFromWebServer() {            
00221             try {
00222                 // Disconnect From NyFolder Web Server
00223                 MyInfo.DisconnectFromWebServer();
00224             } catch (Exception e) {
00225                 Base.Dialogs.MessageError("Disconnection From Web Server", e.Message);
00226             }
00227         }
00228 
00229         // ============================================
00230         // PRIVATE Methods
00231         // ============================================
00232         private void SetSensitiveNetworkMenu (bool sensitive) {
00233             menuManager.SetSensitive("/MenuBar/NetworkMenu/DownloadManager", sensitive);
00234             menuManager.SetSensitive("/MenuBar/NetworkMenu/AddPeer", sensitive);
00235             menuManager.SetSensitive("/MenuBar/NetworkMenu/RmPeer", sensitive);
00236         }
00237 
00238         private void UserConnect (UserInfo userInfo) {
00239             try {
00240                 // Connect & Send Login
00241                 P2PManager.AddPeer(userInfo, userInfo.Ip, userInfo.Port);
00242                 PeerSocket peer = (PeerSocket) P2PManager.KnownPeers[userInfo];
00243                 Cmd.Login(peer, MyInfo.GetInstance());
00244                 OnPeerLogin(peer, userInfo);
00245             } catch (Exception e) {
00246                 string title = "Connection To <b>" + userInfo.Name + "</b> Failed";
00247                 Base.Dialogs.MessageError(title,  e.Message);
00248             }
00249         }
00250 
00251         private void AddUser (UserInfo userInfo) {
00252             networkViewer.Add(userInfo);
00253         }
00254 
00255         private void RemoveUser (UserInfo userInfo) {
00256             if (userInfo != null) {
00257                 notebookViewer.Remove(userInfo);
00258                 networkViewer.Remove(userInfo);
00259                 P2PManager.RemovePeer(userInfo);
00260             }
00261         }
00262 
00263         private void RemoveAllUsers() {
00264             notebookViewer.RemoveAll();
00265             networkViewer.RemoveAll();
00266             P2PManager.RemoveAllPeer();
00267         }
00268 
00269         private bool AcceptUser (PeerSocket peer) {
00270             GUI.Dialogs.AcceptUser dialog = new GUI.Dialogs.AcceptUser(peer);
00271             ResponseType response = dialog.Run();
00272             dialog.Destroy();
00273             return(response == ResponseType.Ok);
00274         }
00275     }
00276 }
